Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-28849 affecting package reaper for versions less than 3.1.1-9
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-28849 affecting package reaper for versions less than 3.1.1-9. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package reaper is earlier than 3.1.1-9, affected by CVE-2024-28849
